title: How Money Changes People
description:
Does money make us happy? Does getting rich solve more problems than it creates? Is there an optimal amount of wealth?
ㅤ
These are just a few ideas I toss around with Morgan Housel, the mega-bestselling author of The Psychology of Money and his new book, Same as Ever. 
ㅤ
In this episode, we also discuss:
ㅤ
+ Why we attach moral value to wealth
+ How social media has permanently changed investing (for the worse)
+ How financial success can change (or not change) a person
+ How to not raise spoiled fucking brats
+ so much more
ㅤ
Check it out the full episode in the podcast section of my channel.
